html:
9.7.18  12:36 am   did you do all your homework in school?

      asking bc i know you are pretty dissatisfied with the school system and i currently have way too much homework to feasibly be done with the amount of hours awake i can be, let alone hours of free time
9.6.18  11:54 pm   i fell out of my hospital bed, how do i get back up
9.6.18  11:08 pm   I have ideas but I don't know how to make them real. How do I force myself to learn and create for an extended period of time?

9.6.18  11:04 pm   I have to learn the baseline of the song "runaround sue" by dion for my acapella group, and when I'm with the group I remember the musical notes, but when I go home I can only think of the melody and then I can't practice my part. Any suggestions?
9.6.18  11:02 pm   are your songs profound? asking for a friend.
9.6.18  10:40 pm   In your video "here is me rising out of bed in the morning" were you actually rising out of bed in the morning or just acting
9.6.18  10:27 pm   9.5.18  10:06 am if you do successfully produce this video by sept 18th with a 3 day absence, does this mean raising the goal to doing the next vid by sept 29th?
9.6.18  10:08 pm   have you ever thrown a strength test at yourself
9.6.18  9:47 pm   you spelled question wrong and i am going to end this with a question mark so that it is an actual question?
9.6.18  9:44 pm   Do your lyrics have a deep meaning behind?

9.6.18  9:05 pm   so how was this new method of making videso?

      how did it work out for tu?
9.6.18  8:50 pm   if 7 had a personality, what would it be?

9.6.18  8:50 pm   I already know some music theory but I want to be so well versed that it sounds like my second language. How long did it take you to learn everything you know now?

      Has your knowledge influenced your music style?

9.6.18  8:30 pm   is bigger better?

this

9.6.18  7:51 pm   what's you mentality for creativity?

      it seems like you try to something everyday consistently
9.6.18  7:28 pm   just made a song where the climax is at the beginning of the song

9.6.18  7:17 pm   Hey Bill, hope all is going great. I play classical music but I don't enjoy it.

      Been playing piano with a professional teacher for 8 years now and I'm pretty miserable and can't balance piano practice and school work. Advice?
9.6.18  6:57 pm   is purple better than blue
9.6.18  6:21 pm   Why SHAVING MYYYY PIANOOOO ISNT working for me?
9.6.18  5:43 pm   Aren't movie trailers just the movie without the credits
9.6.18  5:38 pm   Is any of this real?
9.6.18  5:34 pm   9.4.18  4:33 pm alright you sneaky man you, if you could re-write the 1 rule you feel other people around you follow vehemently, what would it be??
9.6.18  4:45 pm   Hey, which combination of keys do I press to delete my big sad?
9.6.18  4:24 pm   Do you put socks or sandals first?
9.6.18  3:42 pm   you sound like you are amused when you are singing this new song I just love that
9.6.18  3:26 pm   What's your favorite mozart thing?

9.6.18  3:06 pm   hey bill i just spent some hours making garbage digital art and now i'm out of ideas. i usually make garbage when i don't feel so good, but now i have nothing to do and i won't feel so good anymore mr. wurtz. haha, jk, hope you're having a nice day mr. wurtz.
9.6.18  2:49 pm   do you have an attic?
9.6.18  2:45 pm   Do you know who milks the cows every day?
9.6.18  2:29 pm   so how does it feel to be self?
9.6.18  2:25 pm   Will you do more jingles/short videos? Also, will you have a page to suggest a jingle(s)?
9.6.18  2:07 pm   What time signature is "movie star" in
9.6.18  1:33 pm   I'm at school right now, should i ask you something?

9.6.18  1:29 pm   You've mentioned in previous answers that your lyrics in songs (i.e. "I hate myself") don't necessarily reflect your actual thoughts and feelings; you're just "songwriting". Is there any aspect of any of your music that you believe does represent how you actually feel?
9.6.18  1:06 pm   do you plan on writing in the notebook in the near future?
9.6.18  12:44 pm   Why is the earth flat?

9.6.18  12:37 pm   You know, for someone who is so nonchalant about chords (chords are just a supporting character for the melody etc), you sure do make some of the most harmonically complex and thrilling music in the biz.
9.6.18  12:24 pm   How do you come up with visuals that are so abstract, but that don't detract from whatever you are making?
9.6.18  12:22 pm   Where does instinct end and intelligent thought begin?

9.6.18  12:20 pm   How does it feel knowing that people process and interpret your work on such a vast spectrum of conscious understanding?

     What's the most important concept you hope people can gain from your work, if any?

9.6.18  12:17 pm   Why do your songs always fill me with such inexplicable joy and happiness and an irresistible urge to sing along? I always listen to your songs (and your other videos) on loop while I work; it's nice to have something that, despite all the stress and depression in life, never fails to get me bouncing and singing along with a big goofy grin on my face. Thank you for everything you do. La de da!
9.6.18  12:02 pm   Where is my mind

9.6.18  11:26 am   Do you ever think you'd go on a live music tour?

      I would love to come watch you perform that's like a dream.
9.6.18  11:25 am   How long does it usually take you to write and produce a song to completion?
9.6.18  11:06 am   What's your love language? Quality time, acts of service, etc
9.6.18  10:38 am   Why is Hallelujah explicit on Spotify?
